translations: n.[法]法令；判决（decree 的复数形式）；赦令
v.颁布；判决（decree 的三单形式）；命令

phrs.translation: 法令, 律令, 命令, 律法
合意判决, 同意判决书

sentences.sentence: To the Tower, and say, The King decrees the Duke of Norfolk shall not die!
sentences.translation: 对塔上的人说，国王下令赫德福勋爵不用死！

sentences.sentence: The site contains all of the juntas announcements and decrees.
sentences.translation: 该网站包含所有的军训公告和法令。

sentences.sentence: Congress later suspended two of the decrees.
sentences.translation: 国会后来暂停了两项法令的执行。
